column1: New Zealand actor '''Bruce Spence''' (born 1945) played [[the Mouth of Sauron]] in [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King]]. To enhance the sinister aspect of the character, Spence's real mouth was digitally enlarged.

column2: I've never been so submerged in costume and make-up and masks et cetera as I have in this film
column3: Bruce Spence, "Costume Design", [[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King (extended edition)
